main.name: Francis Decena
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer & Founder of Creativo Rare
main.bio: A Full Stack Web Developer with technical leadership, communication and presentations skills. Experienced in (SDLC) software development life cycle from data gathering, design, building, implementation and to integration. He likes to explore and try new things especially when it comes to development. As a developer he is also a team player who likes to collaborate with his team members and to have brain storming ideas, He is a man of focus and lastly he is full time learner.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinker and I'm always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information and Technology
education.description: I took my Bachelor of Science in Information and Technology where I achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind both software and hardware and also this is where I started to like programming at first it was really frustrating at some point but with the help of my professors and collage friends I managed to survived. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming, the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

work.title: Senior Software Developer
work.description: It is my first time work abroad so at first I was kind of overwhelmed because of the pressure and adjustment especially in the environment. I missed my family and friends I knew from that moment I need to focused. The company hired me because they need a software developer who is responsible enough that can deliver in tight schedule and it has various of skill sets and experience to finish the project.
work.secondDescription: I have created both frontend and backend of the web application we called it (TMS) Truck Management System. The main process of the application is to study and monitor all the incoming trucks to Singapore and also checking their truck loads for any possible prohibited goods. The system composed of different components in order to work. I have also integrated one of the components of (TMS) Truck Management System into one of our 3rd party provider of special scanning machines for trucks.

work.title: Techincal Lead Senior Software Engineer
work.description: I worked as technical lead software engineer at Concierge under Accenture CMT and I'm handling two teams one in local shore (Philippines) and the other one is from (Seattle). My main work is to guide and create transition of tech stacks from Node Js and Vanilla Js to .Net Core and React Js to one of their web applications we called it as (Digital Desk).
work.secondDescription: It took us 6 months to complete the phase 1 of the application and we also managed to deployed and implemented it to production. It is a huge web application it was created specifically for O365 Microsoft technical support team of Accenture Philippines. Besides on that I have also accomplished some projects in Accenture, I have created an OCR application to monitor and study all prohibited actions of tech support towards getting the PII's (Personal Identifiable Information) of our clients. I used Pytesseract for the OCR and python flask for the API.

work.title: Systems Analyst
work.description: This is where I grow as a developer. Being the pioneer developer of the team I learned a lot of experiences, challenges and valuable skills that even today I'm still using it. I have created various systems for the bank most of it focused in messaging platform.
work.secondDescription: My team handled hundreds of thousands transactions everyday thru our sms, email and chat application. Our application catered both local and international clients. One of the highlights of my career is that I was assigned to create an OTP secure transaction or we called it as 3D Secure it is a protocol designed to be an additional security layer for online credit and debit card transactions. I'm just the only developer who created the security application and until to this date the bank still using the applications that I have created to processed secured transactions.

skills1.name: .Net
skills1.description: My first love I worked as .Net Developer for 7 yrs. Security is rock solid and support is always there from Microsoft and mostly the performance is excellent especially the INTELLISENSE!

skills1.name: Node Js
skills1.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice its lightweight, fast and reliable. Most of the time I always pair it with React Js and Redux and also with MongoDB. I love and enjoying this MERN stack.

skills1.name: React Js
skills1.description: I really like React JS its fast and lightweight together with Redux as state management that is why many developers now chooses to work on React JS and Redux as their main tools for front end development framework.

skills1.name: Mongo DB
skills1.description: I have used many different database systems and I am educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills1.name: Git
skills1.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills1.name: Bootstrap 4
skills1.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills1.name: Heroku
skills1.description: I use Heroku as my cloud platform for its being a developer friendly, fast and reliable and also its convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

skills1.name: Python
skills1.description: I used python one of my projects before that is where I started to like it. I used pytesseract for OCR and python flask to create an API. I like python its simple, reliable and easy to learn programming language.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
